name: Downhill Ski
description:
A one-button game where you ski down a hill. See how far you can go without crashing into something. Hold any button to start a turn and release to go in the direction of the pointer.

By Allan Moua, Manny Fluss, and Ian Cowan

made using Kenta Cho's crisp-game-lib for the course CMPM 170 at UCSC
